about_the_game:
In Yes Sir you command your little army of roman soldiers to their target positions.

Up! Down! Left! Right!
What starts as a simple mechanic will make your brain smoke after some time.
Especially after the levels get larger and larger and additional block types such as different soldiers, two-direction fences, and one-direction stairs make the options to consider more and more complex.

Compare your solution to the performance of other commanders out there and figure out the optimal solution for each of the more than 300 levels.

Your soldiers are awaiting your orders.

Features

  • More than 200 levels from easy to very challenging

  • Deadlock free puzzles.
    Even if you make a wrong move. The levels are setup such that you can always still reach the goal. All roads lead to Rome!

  • Level stats
    Compare your solution to the solution of other players.
    See how many move it took other players to solve the level.
    Optimize your solution until the game tells you that your solution is optimal.

Are your ready for your adventure?
Your soldiers are waiting. At your command!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-1035G4 or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Yes Sir! Your soldiers are awaiting your orders. Will you be able to lead them to success? They are at your command in this cozy but challenging sokoban puzzle game.
